languages.text: "Партия в регицид. Еще когда мы зашли, я обратил внимание на комбинацию и терялся в догадках, каков был замысел играющего за белые фигуры... Судя по твоему лицу, партия осталась еще со времен Леди Теодоры".

traits.locale_text: "Партия в регицид. Еще когда мы зашли, я обратил внимание на комбинацию и терялся в догадках, каков был замысел играющего за белые фигуры... Судя по твоему лицу, партия осталась еще со времен Леди Теодоры".

languages.text: "The regicide game. As soon as we came in, I noticed the combination and I couldn't help wondering about the thinking behind white's strategy... But your face tells me this game is another thing left over from Lady Theodora's time."
languages.original_text: "Партия в регицид. Еще когда мы зашли, я обратил внимание на комбинацию и терялся в догадках, каков был замысел играющего за белые фигуры... Судя по твоему лицу, партия осталась еще со времен Леди Теодоры".

traits.locale_text: "The regicide game. As soon as we came in, I noticed the combination and I couldn't help wondering about the thinking behind white's strategy... But your face tells me this game is another thing left over from Lady Theodora's time."

"The regicide game. As soon as we came in, I noticed the combination and I couldn't help wondering about the thinking behind white's strategy... But your face tells me this game is another thing left over from Lady Theodora's time."

"The regicide game. As soon as we came in, I noticed the combination and I couldn't help wondering about the thinking behind white's strategy... But your face tells me this game is another thing left over from Lady Theodora's time."

"The regicide game. As soon as we came in, I noticed the combination and I couldn't help wondering about the thinking behind white's strategy... But your face tells me this game is another thing left over from Lady Theodora's time."

languages.text: “是那盘弑君棋。一走进这个房间，我就注意到了那样的阵型。我一直都想问问白棋为什么要那么走……但你的表情让我意识到，那盘没下完的棋是西奥多拉夫人留下的另一件遗物。”
languages.original_text: "The regicide game. As soon as we came in, I noticed the combination and I couldn't help wondering about the thinking behind white's strategy... But your face tells me this game is another thing left over from Lady Theodora's time."

traits.locale_text: “是那盘弑君棋。一走进这个房间，我就注意到了那样的阵型。我一直都想问问白棋为什么要那么走……但你的表情让我意识到，那盘没下完的棋是西奥多拉夫人留下的另一件遗物。”

languages.text: «La partida de regicidio. En cuanto hemos entrado he visto la combinación y no he podido evitar preguntarme por la estrategia de las blancas... pero vista su expresión, la partida es otro recuerdo de la época de lady Theodora».
languages.original_text: "The regicide game. As soon as we came in, I noticed the combination and I couldn't help wondering about the thinking behind white's strategy... But your face tells me this game is another thing left over from Lady Theodora's time."

traits.locale_text: «La partida de regicidio. En cuanto hemos entrado he visto la combinación y no he podido evitar preguntarme por la estrategia de las blancas... pero vista su expresión, la partida es otro recuerdo de la época de lady Theodora».

languages.text: 「レジサイドゲーム。開始直後に珍しい組み合わせの戦法に気づいて、白の戦略の背後にある考え方を考えずにはいられなかった…だが、あなたの顔を見ていると、このゲームもレディ・シオドーラの時代の名残なんだと感じられたよ」
languages.original_text: "The regicide game. As soon as we came in, I noticed the combination and I couldn't help wondering about the thinking behind white's strategy... But your face tells me this game is another thing left over from Lady Theodora's time."

traits.locale_text: 「レジサイドゲーム。開始直後に珍しい組み合わせの戦法に気づいて、白の戦略の背後にある考え方を考えずにはいられなかった…だが、あなたの顔を見ていると、このゲームもレディ・シオドーラの時代の名残なんだと感じられたよ」

languages.text: « La partie de régicide. J'ai remarqué cette manœuvre dès notre arrivée et depuis, je ne peux pas m'empêcher de m'interroger sur la stratégie des blancs... Mais à voir votre expression, j'en déduis que ce n'est qu'un autre vestige de feu dame Théodora. »
languages.original_text: "The regicide game. As soon as we came in, I noticed the combination and I couldn't help wondering about the thinking behind white's strategy... But your face tells me this game is another thing left over from Lady Theodora's time."

traits.locale_text: « La partie de régicide. J'ai remarqué cette manœuvre dès notre arrivée et depuis, je ne peux pas m'empêcher de m'interroger sur la stratégie des blancs... Mais à voir votre expression, j'en déduis que ce n'est qu'un autre vestige de feu dame Théodora. »

languages.text: "Das Königsmord-Spiel. Als wir reinkamen, ist mir die Kombination direkt aufgefallen, und ich würde gerne wissen, was hinter der Strategie von Weiß steckt ... Aber Euer Gesicht verrät mir, dass diese Party noch von Lady Theodora gespielt wurde."
languages.original_text: "The regicide game. As soon as we came in, I noticed the combination and I couldn't help wondering about the thinking behind white's strategy... But your face tells me this game is another thing left over from Lady Theodora's time."

traits.locale_text: "Das Königsmord-Spiel. Als wir reinkamen, ist mir die Kombination direkt aufgefallen, und ich würde gerne wissen, was hinter der Strategie von Weiß steckt ... Aber Euer Gesicht verrät mir, dass diese Party noch von Lady Theodora gespielt wurde."

languages.text: "Kral katili oyunu... İçeri girdiğimiz an kombinasyonu fark ettim ve beyaz oyuncunun stratejisinin ardında yatan şeyi düşünmekten kendimi alıkoyamadım ama... Yüzüne bakınca bunun Leydi Theodora'nın vaktinden kalma şeylerden biri daha olduğunu anlıyorum."
languages.original_text: "The regicide game. As soon as we came in, I noticed the combination and I couldn't help wondering about the thinking behind white's strategy... But your face tells me this game is another thing left over from Lady Theodora's time."
